overview: Get the lowdown on hip-hop stars OutKast with this unauthorized documentary that charts the duo's juggernaut career, from their humble origins in an Atlanta suburb to the chart-topping success of their 2003 release, "SpeakerBoxxx/The Love Below." Combining rare footage of Andr√© 3000 and Big Boi with candid insights offered by their friends and colleagues, this biographical portrait sheds fresh light on OutKast's rapid rise to fame.
title: Outkast: Psychedelic Funk Soul Brothers
